review: It is fast, but it has its limits. Almost everything I want to watch has to be purchased, even with Prime. Also, some of the shows I've watched are free for one season, then there's a charge for the next season. Some of the shows have an Amazon commercial at about 2 times the volume of the show you're watching. Finally, the optical audio out sound is very harsh.
